welcome.title: Beautiful Task
welcome.subtitle: Management
welcome.description: Organize your life with elegance. A delightful task management experience that makes productivity feel effortless.

features.title: Everything you need to stay organized
features.subtitle: Designed with love and attention to detail, TaskFlow brings you the perfect balance of functionality and beauty.

smartTags.title: Smart Tags
smartTags.description: Organize and filter your tasks with customizable tags

dashboard.title: Dashboard
